channel.title: Blog on Codescapade
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on Codescapade

item.title: The Beginning
item.description: I decided to create a new portfolio / blog website two weeks ago. This is it, it is still a work in progress but it works. I’ve made blog sites before but those were mostly Wordpress with an existing theme. This time I have a lot more experience in web dev so I wanted more control.
